segments.text: Honey , I have something important to say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Something important ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have just booked two tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tickets ? What tickets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two air tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Air tickets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We will fly to Paris the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ? The day after tomorrow ? What are you talking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today is June 18 , isn ’ t it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . So ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Think about it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then it is June 20 the day after tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Think about it carefully .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , come on . Tell me please . Why did you book tickets to Paris ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , honey ! Don ’ t you remember this important day to us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is our 10th wedding anniversary this June 20 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our 10th wedding anniversary ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . You completely forgot it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Darling . I think you have made a mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have made a mistake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We married on July 20 ten years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: July 20 ? But I think it should be June 20 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We had planned to marry on June 20 , but something happened , so we had to put off our wedding day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I remember now . We put it off . I did make a mistake . But how shall we deal with the tickets ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since you have booked . Then let ’ s celebrate our wedding anniversary before hand .
segments.speaker: S2
